20efa634-dc2d-44a0-9acc-3aa9e80c3927.name: Easy to hit
20efa634-dc2d-44a0-9acc-3aa9e80c3927.notes: Others can target your eyes at -6

5482de01-cf3f-43b1-ab46-72d02b31a481.name: Directional
5482de01-cf3f-43b1-ab46-72d02b31a481.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

a0b72352-4710-4930-a1b6-6f32be735d01.name: Tough Skin
a0b72352-4710-4930-a1b6-6f32be735d01.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

873b6b73-58ef-4cf3-ac3a-29dd25065d53.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

e05a1719-03fb-44fb-b261-6732345005b8.name: Flexibility (Double-Jointed)
e05a1719-03fb-44fb-b261-6732345005b8.notes: May ignore up to -5 in penalties for close quarters

99ab797e-289c-4164-85be-e7515bfe9f6c.name: Diffuse
99ab797e-289c-4164-85be-e7515bfe9f6c.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

da9b71c2-d82d-4b05-b0a2-ec9def876146.name: Homogenous
da9b71c2-d82d-4b05-b0a2-ec9def876146.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

9dd0fd4e-dc8c-40db-9166-aeec3999d7b2.name: No Blood
9dd0fd4e-dc8c-40db-9166-aeec3999d7b2.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

4418eb99-6abc-4355-bf9b-23e098ae321e.name: No Brain
4418eb99-6abc-4355-bf9b-23e098ae321e.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

084d4c61-bd4f-467e-8594-3587802a9c81.name: No Eyes
084d4c61-bd4f-467e-8594-3587802a9c81.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

73cd8eb0-5c76-47ad-9f1f-88ddf85ea5d6.name: No Head
73cd8eb0-5c76-47ad-9f1f-88ddf85ea5d6.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

127df0f2-1b96-4366-814b-bb4ba8529f48.name: No Neck
127df0f2-1b96-4366-814b-bb4ba8529f48.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

05962395-543a-4d8e-8066-f5eeb441940b.name: No Vitals
05962395-543a-4d8e-8066-f5eeb441940b.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

0d00b80f-86f7-4d77-b6f9-f77672f325e8.name: Unliving
0d00b80f-86f7-4d77-b6f9-f77672f325e8.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

bc696737-eded-4da1-a340-8e45f59b322b.name: Resistant to Disease
bc696737-eded-4da1-a340-8e45f59b322b.notes: Given the deficiencies of their primitive physiology, Hiver medicine excels at improving their resistance to various infections and internal disfunctions. Most Hivers enjoy two levels of this advantage, but its benefits are halved (to +4) because of their Weak Immune System disadvantage, described under Disadvantages. Rare Hivers from lower-TL backgrounds might not enjoy this benefit.

3163a2eb-ceea-420a-bb86-ba03314ac317.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

5b33a305-1db9-4d01-a489-c6235587a5af.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

8c5b6321-b177-4919-aedd-44d36d32d8df.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

518c35b3-6381-4ecb-a857-82a617641e3c.name: Susceptible (disease - nervous, lymph nodes, tissue, brain)
518c35b3-6381-4ecb-a857-82a617641e3c.notes: While the Hiver"s relatively crude physiology confers manybenelits (primary among them their Regrowth advanttage), it also creates problcms. Foremost among these are frequent breakdowns in their endocrine system.

e4619848-590c-4205-b4d6-30d31b910e83.name: Callous
e4619848-590c-4205-b4d6-30d31b910e83.notes: +1 to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

features.situation: from past victims and anyone with Empathy

69073207-05cb-4016-b218-30a37d4ff5b2.name: Combat Paralysis
69073207-05cb-4016-b218-30a37d4ff5b2.notes: In any situation in which personal harm seems imminent, make a HT roll. Do not roll until the instant you need to fight, run, pull the trigger, or whatever. Any roll over 13 is a failure, even if you have HT 14+. On a success, you can act normally. On a failure, you are mentally stunned.

5fb7fa01-79fc-43b5-ad11-fbec991f90a5.name: Cowardice
5fb7fa01-79fc-43b5-ad11-fbec991f90a5.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to risk physical danger. Roll at -5 if you must risk death.

97cdc1b0-6cb6-489e-a844-6074de064c1f.name: Curious
97cdc1b0-6cb6-489e-a844-6074de064c1f.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

65979c23-a6a1-43c2-81f1-f684c76f2d26.name: Low Pain Threshold
65979c23-a6a1-43c2-81f1-f684c76f2d26.notes: Double the shock from any injury. You roll at -4 to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

eaad11ea-803c-47b3-b748-db7bf5b3dc16.name: Post-Combat Shakes
eaad11ea-803c-47b3-b748-db7bf5b3dc16.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

features.situation: from individuals sensitive to criticism or insults that you interact with

0ccdf82f-820d-4381-9d79-36dd5f5a2e55.name: Virus magnet -- roll HT+2 every month or come down with an annoying but treatable illness

20453a4d-d618-4219-873c-fc9fa2b362ca.name: Selfish (Hivers as a race are selfish, though less so as individuals)
20453a4d-d618-4219-873c-fc9fa2b362ca.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

887221ef-a371-41c7-b5e9-dbd76118492a.name: Limited (Vs. Psionic Vampirism and Telepathy only)
